titleStmt.title: The danger of deferring repentance discovered by that reverend and faithfull minister of the word, William Fenner.
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Stafford and are to be sold by Richard Burton,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A sermon of Mr. William Fenners at Maidstone, September 25, 1629.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
